divs: sighting details****in order to rush this report off i will be brief, please contact for amplifying information*** 4 large triangle ufo's currently hovering over san diego, ca in the clairmont mesa area, they are now glowing red. they have merged into one and separated back into 4 again. wife and 21 year old stepson have eyes on target at this time. i will be trying to get pics\video as soon as possible. okay correction she was confused, or i made a mistake the lights were white not red. white lights. i specifically asked her (as i am a 20+ year u.s. navy combat veteran) if they displayed red lights on left wing, green on right wing, fog landing lights underneath, red light on top of tail section etc... she said "babe...they were triangle and started as 3...then 4 then merged into one, then it was 2 white lights "in a linear perspective" (i am still trying to get some amplifying information as to what she meant by linear), i understand that as one white light right behind a 2nd one (she said that they were very close as in right next to one another). they did not separate back into 4 again. right now they are remaining as 2 white lights. i already made a voice report to ruben. now that i got the initial report off i will do my best to answer your questions. my wife initially called me at 8:38pm pst from california. she was on the 15 north freeway heading north from south san diego (around naval base) she stated that she was driving and noticed 3 rather large triangle shaped craft silently hovering at approx. position angle 4 in the sky as she was south on the 15 north freeway looking north towards clairmont mesa. this was at dusk initially where she was able to make out a definitive triangle shape. as darkness settled in the triangles became white lights in the sky merging in and out of 1. the motion she described as being very slow...almost at a standstill and hovering. no sound of propulsion as they were silent. now we know that miramar marine corp air station lies to the north in the direction she was facing. she is a san diego, ca native and had never seen any aircraft like that operating in the direction she stated. she knows (having been married to me long enough as a chief in the u.s. navy) the difference between helicopters and aircraft. they were floating triangle bricks basically. her feelings were that of pretty intense nervousness. she is still a little shaken up by it. i had always been the sci-fi guy listening to coast to coast am...she would just roll her eyes at my x-files likeness ;-) but she has now seen something (which kinda sucks cuz i have never gotten to actually see one). so she is a full believer now. she broke off contact at approx. 9:30pm san diego, ca time as she had to be somewhere. but according to her they seemed to be in no hurry to take off or avoid detection so they may still be airborne.
Summary: Wife watching 4 triangle UFO's glowing red in San Diego right now
trends: There have been no other sightings in Piedmont
